content:

title: Top Places to visit in Ranchi, Jharkhand
content: Ranchi is the capital of the Indian state of Jharkhand. Ranchi was the centre of the Jharkhand movement, which called for a separate state for the tribal regions of South Bihar, northern Orissa, western West Bengal and the eastern area of what is present-day Chhattisgarh. title: Top Places to visit in Sahibganj, Sahebganj, Jharkhand
content: Sahebganj (also known as Sahibganj) is a town and Municipality of Sahebganj district of Jharkhand state, India, which also serves as the district headquarters for Sahibganj District. content: Seraikela-Kharsawan district or Saraikella and Kharaswan district: formerly the Princely State of Seraikella/Saraikella is one of the twenty-four districts of Jharkhand state in eastern India. title: Top Places to visit in Simdega, Jharkhand
content: Simdega is a city in the Indian state of Jharkhand. Simdega is the administrative headquarters of the eponymous district and Subdivision. Top Places to visit in Bagalkot, Karnataka
content: Bagalkot, or Bagalakote, is a city in the state of Karnataka, India, which is also the headquarters of Bagalkote district. title: Top Places to visit in Ballari, Karnataka
content: Bellary, officially Ballari, in the eponymous Bellari district, is a major city in the state of Karnataka, India. It is 311 km from the state capital of Bangaluru and 358 km from Hyderabad. title: Top Places to visit in Belagavi, Belgaum Karnataka

title: Top Places to visit in Bengaluru Rural, Bengaluru, Karnataka
content: Bengaluru Rural District is one of the 30 districts in Karnataka, India. It was formed in 1986, when Bengaluru was divided into Bengaluru (Rural) and Bengaluru (Urban).
